The ability of unlabelled B7-1Ig or B7-2Ig to compete with biotinylated B7-1Ig or B7-2Ig, respectively, was assessed by mixing varying amounts of the competing protein with a quantity of biotinylated B7-1Ig or B7-2Ig shown to be non-saturating (i.e., 70 ng/mL; 1.5 nM) and performing the binding assays as described above.
